text:
🔹Discover 😯 how #hydroxychloquine and #chloroquine work 🔎 and why so many people are interested by #antimalarials in the context of #covid19 #pandemia 🌍 to the point where there is a world-wide shortage 🚧 for #lupus #patients!
Thanks to @FChasset for the #pathogenesis slide. https://t.co/drte3lSZ05
